MC2Coordinate getCentroidForLandFeature (  const GfxFeature &  feature  ) 
 

Returns centroid point of a land feature.

Determined either by lookup on the features basename (

See also:
GfxFeature::getBasename() ) or by calculating it from the polygon. Assumes the feature is a LAND feature. If it is not a GfxFeature::LAND type then the return value will undefined.
Parameters:
feature 
Returns:
A good center point of the feature.
